class.name: ExecBuildStep
class.description: A [build step](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Command+Line) running the specified executable with given arguments

function.name: exec
function.description: Adds a [build step](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Command+Line) running the specified executable with given arguments @see ExecBuildStep

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Working+Directory) for the executable, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: command.parameters
param.description: A space-separated arguments list for the executable
